titleStmt.title: A regiment for the sea conteyning most profitable rules, mathematical experiences, and perfect knovvledge of nauigation, for all coastes and countreys: most needefull and necessarie for all seafaring men and trauellers, as pilotes, mariners, marchants. [et] c. Exactly deuised and made by VVilliam Bourne.
titleStmt.author: Bourne, William, d. 1583.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [Henry Bynneman for] Thomas Hacket, and are to be solde at his shop in the Royall Exchaunge, at the signe of the Greene Dragon,

notesStmt.note: The "Table or kalender" on C2 begins with 1574.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in the Royall Exchaunge, at the signe of the Greene Dragon
